website_summaries.verdict: Kids have the option of either chewing these tiny tablets or swallowing them whole.
pros: Tiny pill is easy for kids to swallow
Does a good job of relieving stomach issues and improving regularity
Children tolerate the tablets well, with little to no stomach upset after taking
cons: Some children aren’t thrilled with the taste, and others won’t swallow the tablet
Pills are very small, hard to handle, and roll away easily

website_summaries.verdict: Top choice for kids who suffer from tummy troubles like constipation.
pros: Parents rave the vitamin's tiny size
Loaded with probiotics that aid digestion
Boosts immunity to keep children healthy

customer_reviews.title: My 9 year old has suffered from a condition called ...
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old has suffered from a condition called "Abdominal Migraines" since age 3. Any amount of anxiety would trigger stomach aches that lead to constipation, then vomiting. I've tried certain brands of Probiotics but nothing really made a noticeable difference until I started giving her this brand. I forgot where I put the bottle for a couple of days and right away she started complaining of stomach aches. After I found the bottle gave her a couple of pills, I haven't heard any complaints since. I am about to buy another bottle after I write this review.
customer_reviews.author: ADRIENNE ATKINS

customer_reviews.title: I can tell right away if he forgets to take them because he gets really bad drainage and sniffles constantly
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old has been taking pro kids ent for 3 months now it has made a huge difference for him. He suffered from chronic sinusitis and was constantly on antibiotics he even was scheduled for surgery to remove his adenoids until I found these probiotics. I can tell right away if he forgets to take them because he gets really bad drainage and sniffles constantly. He enjoys the strawberry taste and loves that he can chew them up right after he brushes his teeth. Thanks to these my son will stay out of the operating room for awhile longer!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: We call this my 6 yo daughter's "MAGIC PILLS"!!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yo has had tummy backup troubles since she was born. Her DR prescribed Miralax, so we've been using that off/on for years. Which helps but it doesn't solve the issue. Recently she's even come home from school because of her tummy hurting. We heard probiotics help, so I googled and this one seemed so much better than the others since it's time released. It worked within a day and still is! It really is magic to her, she feels so much better and likes the taste (she can't swallow it yet). We're buying this from now on, no more miralax!
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Amazing improvement in 6 year old's stomach pain!
customer_reviews.text: Before this we gave my daughter culturel and frequently miralax. We taught her to swallow pills by putting it in ice cream for a couple of weeks. For 2.5 months now I have not heard a complaint about stomach pain, which used to be pretty much daily. I highly recommend this, as much as any other product I have ever recommended!!

I have noticed that they have not come home with the usual early school colds like they did last year. They have also mentioned that their tummies are feeling better. I am planning on purchasing these again to keep my kids healthy all year long.

We've had no runny noses, coughs or seasonal crud since he started these. Healthy kids means a happy mama!

Nothing the dr gave me would work and he basically said don't worry ab it...it hurt and bothered me constantly. I read up on probiotics for the ear and was already taking this brand for digestion. One bottle cleared my abscess. Steroids and antibiotics did nothing for me, but these healed my issue. So thankful to have found these.

customer_reviews.title: These probiotics are the best. My four year old had to go through ...

I like that the pearl is time released so it wasn’t just killed by the antibiotic my daughter was on. I was pretty concerned about the fact that they have to be swollwed but really are tiny and my child has zero problems taking them. I definitely recommend them.

customer_reviews.text: I'm not a kid but these still work. i don't use them on a regular basis but when I get a sore in my mouth or my gums get a bit tender (no idea why but it happens from time to time) this works great. I take one after brushing my teeth before bedtime and then just suck on it so it slowly releases and does it's magic. Only need to do it for a day or two and all is well again. Wonderful product

It’s not health quality and I don’t refer to any one. And I feel so horrible to give it to her again. And my daughter got sick after that end up in IcU. You guys are playing with other people health.

customer_reviews.title: No more strep throat!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these probiotics after my daughter had multiple cases of strep throat and multiple treatments of antibiotics. I was just so worried about always giving her antibiotics. Over the course of a couple of years she had about 8 cases of strep. She has been taking these pills for over a year and hasn’t gotten strep once! She calls these her “strep pills,” and takes one every night after brushing her teeth. She likes the taste and they dissolve quickly. These pills are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do really like this, my son has a lot of sinus ...
customer_reviews.text: I do really like this, my son has a lot of sinus issues as well as tons of strep throat in the past and so far this year he has not been sick. He likes the taste also. My only complaint is the amount of tablets per bottle/price, it would be nice if it were a full one month supply with 60 tablets like the adult PRO-15 and regular Pro-Kids bottles. The ENT only comes with 45. Other than that we highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Murray

customer_reviews.title: Get the Strawberry Vanilla Flavor - NOT Tangy Orange!
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd bottle (2 purchased through Amazon, 1 purchased through Walmart Marketplace), and I’m about to order our 4th. This works so well for us! We only use it as needed (when our 5-year-old’s tonsils get inflamed & smell funky) - 1 tablet after brushing/before bed for a few nights in a row gets him back to fresh and seems to have prevented new ear infections from developing (he had a couple prior to trying this product). **we’ve only tried the strawberry vanilla and think they’re quite tasty** (the tangy orange flavor seems to have a lot of bad reviews)
customer_reviews.author: MCapa

customer_reviews.title: We started using these after researching and talking with or doctor and I am so happy to say we haven't had strep since
customer_reviews.text: After tons and tons of research I came across these in hopes it would help with my children who were getting Strep Throat all the time! They wanted to take my daughters tonsils out and I said no because I wanted to try something different first. My son was on antibiotics for a month straight! We started using these after researching and talking with or doctor and I am so happy to say we haven't had strep since! It has been almost a year!!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: April Friend

customer_reviews.title: Can't be without this product!
customer_reviews.text: These are a little more cost than most probiotic BUT it is more specific to the ear, nose and throat. I have a child who gets chronic sinus infections and stumbled across these. We have been using them for 5 months now and really have found major improvements with the rate if sinus infections this season (no sinus infections). They say they are chewable and flavored strawberry vanilla but my child does not like the flavor and takes a smsll sip of grape juice with it to help. I would highly recommend for someone with chronic sinus infections.
customer_reviews.author: veggiefan

customer_reviews.title: Avoiding the Operating Table
customer_reviews.text: My one year old is avoiding adenoid surgery thanks to these. His adenoids were so swollen that he had sleep apenea at night and snored like a grown man. Since taking these (and continuing Zyrtec) he can breath at night and actually sleeps peacefully. No more mouth breathing either. We didn’t notice results right away and had to play around with dosage some, but we stuck with it and what an improvement. If he gets a cold from big sis, I give him the max dosage and it really helps him breath.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Finally! My sons adenoids are improving!!!
customer_reviews.text: We tried everything. Really. Went to so many doctors, ENT, natural doctors. Finally I found this. His coughing from chronic sinitus that he has has had on and off since he was 3 (he is 7 now) immediately improved after a few days of this. I wish I knew about this earlier. If your child has adenoid problems, try this! Thank you!!!

The pills were discolored, there physical appearance is just off...like they got wet or something.

customer_reviews.title: Small pills
customer_reviews.text: My daughter complains of stomach aches a lot so I thought we'd try a probiotic. Pros: *Small and circular to make pills easier to swallow *Pills taste sweet and will eventually disovle on tongue if child isn't able to swallow *Can easily be hidden in yogurt as well *Small bottle so it doesn't take up much spacein the cupboard She still sometimes complains of stomach aches but I'm a firm believer in the benefits of probiotics so she continues to take these. She hasn't experienced any negative side effects. I enjoy writing quality reviews. If you've found this review helpful, and you'd like to give me some encouragement, please click "yes" below. Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Miracle probiotic! Our 3yo has been on antibiotics every ...
customer_reviews.text: Miracle probiotic! Our 3yo has been on antibiotics every 6-8 weeks for almost a year for sinus infections. Despite having tubes put in and having his adenoids removed, he continued to develop sever sinus infections. We started him on ENT probiotics 4 weeks ago ( 2 a day at lunch). For the first time in a 11 months, he doesn't have a cough, post nasal drip, or congestion! There has been a cold running the Montessori he attends, and he hasn't been sick. I cannot put in to words the feeling of seeing my son healthy and energetic! If your child suffers with frequent upper respiratory infections, this probiotic is a must have!

customer_reviews.title: Life changing
customer_reviews.text: Our 3 year old toddler has had bowel issues since he was an infant and we have tried everything. We would end up having to use a pedialax suppository once a week or so because he could not have bm's otherwise. We tried so many different probiotics, home remedy's, etc, but nothing worked until we started using this PRO-kids probiotic. I can't tell you why it works better, but within 3-4 weeks after starting on this product, our son started slowly having BM's, and now goes every single day. Everyone's anatomy is different obviously, but for our child, this product was life changing.
customer_reviews.author: A. Person

customer_reviews.title: He always has stomach issues since he doesn't like a lot of foods
customer_reviews.text: These are for my grandchild who has PDD (autism sprectum). He always has stomach issues since he doesn't like a lot of foods. He is 9 years old and able to swallow these and he knows it helps him with his "gas" problem. So it is a big help.

customer_reviews.title: Great Probiotic
customer_reviews.text: One of our children had a specific skin/rash issue that we couldn't solve medically and after 3 weeks of these probiotics it completely cleared up. His skin has still been clear after 2 years. Would recommend to anyone.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'd recommend these for anyone - they are hard for the kids at first because they don't taste that great when chewed, but I can get both of them to swallow the pearls, which is the point of the capsule. My five and two year old have been taking these for a couple of months. I am concerned with my children's microbiome, especially my sons because he has EoE. I cannot say for certain, but these appear to be helping his symptoms. We will know more after he has a scope. I give him two a day and have been working hard on his diet in hopes of altering his mircobiome to reduce the inflammation in his body.
customer_reviews.author: Jess B.

customer_reviews.title: The best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: The last 2 .5 years have been really rough ... MY son has hand ear tubes put in his ears and had his adenoids and tonsils removed and nothing seemed to help him :( I feel like we lived at the doctors going to specialist after specialist.. Finally I was about to give up .. I started doing my own research and I came across Pro-Kids ENT I loved the reviews and wanted to try it .. What a change in my son... its been a month and this has helped my son so much Thank you so much <3
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: (I have one son who is horrible about eating junk food and he often gets every ...
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with this probiotic. Here's why: 1- These "pearls" have a time-release feature and so much more of the probiotic actually makes it to the gut compared to other probiotics. 2- They don't need to be refrigerated! 3- They are keeping my kids well. (I have one son who is horrible about eating junk food and he often gets every little cold or virus. I have noticed that he is staying well since starting these. He also is spending less time in the bathroom with constipation issues.) Would totally recommend this to friends!
customer_reviews.author: BunchaNelsonsTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, has kept ear infections away
customer_reviews.text: While I don't have scientific proof behind my own kids using this, we take this daily and both of my kids have been ear infection free. My son had so many infections That he had tubes put in and then a year later when they fell out they came right back. We tried all the other options out there. Then we started these, plus eliminated cow's milk and he and my daughter stopped getting infections. Assoon as they get a little runny nose we give them the intense support and give 2-3 a day and they are better within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: CrimsonandBlue

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get my daughter to take and works great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter went through a phase where she was getting sick all the time. Stomach flu, throat infections, allergies, etc. I started her on these and she is hardly sick at all. Maybe once in a year with a low grade temp. Nothing like she had been going through. She loves the taste and doesn’t give me any issues with taking it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna s

customer_reviews.title: No Stomach Pain
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My 7 yr old has tried several different probiotics and this is the 1st that hasn't given him stomach pain. He's been on them for about 2 weeks. We were told by my sons GI doctor to start a probiotic. We are still waiting to see all the benefit but are hopeful this will provide the relief he needs. No stomach pain is a HUGE start. Other probiotics we had to stop after a week because his stomach couldn't tolerate.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kozera

customer_reviews.title: Kids LOVE the taste!
customer_reviews.text: Love that this has both K12 and M18! ENT and dental health support in one product. This is the only product flavored for kids that I found containing both strains of probiotics. The best part is that my kids actually like the flavor and ask for it. We give it to them after they brush their teeth at night and have been on the lookout for any "negative" effects, as giving your child something to eat after brushing teeth for the night goes against instinct. If you're even considering this product, just do it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my 5 year old to chew on
customer_reviews.text: Gave these a try for my 10 year old. He doesn't have major issues BUT gets constipated from time to time. Ever since he began taking these, he has not gotten constipated. His bowel movements have been regular. He likes the tangy taste of them. They are round and tiny... perfect for my 5 year old to chew on. Bonus: I read that probiotics can help boost their immune system. Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Wish I found this sooner
customer_reviews.text: Call me crazy but I swear after a month my kid has completely changed. He had a lot of behavioral problems and was kicked out of two daycares. I tried everything... behavior charts, time outs, you name it. But after researching I came across different vitamins and probiotics. I’ve tried some but found this one to be the game changer! I have not had to sign off on an incident report since early November. My sons speech has increased along with his focus. They pills are easy to swallow whole and my three year old has no more ear infections to boot!! My seven year old hates the flavor though.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great probiotic for kids--small and easy to take
customer_reviews.text: I've recently repurchased this for my 12 year old daughter. She is VERY active in competitive sports and last winter she was fighting colds and viruses all season. I wanted to give her immune system a boost, and having recently researched this I decided on a probiotic and vitamin D/K for both of us. This probiotic is easy to take, tiny, requires no refrigeration (although I do keep it in the fridge unless we're travelling), and she and I have both stayed healthy all season so far. MUCH better than last year! This was a great addition to our daily routine.
customer_reviews.author: K. Capon

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old. She eats a good diet but sometimes has bathroom issues. I knew getting probiotics in her gut was key to helping. She loves these little chewable pearls. She actually reminds me to give them to her. She asks for her little orange things. The simple fact that they taste good and are easy to get my child to take makes them worth it. I'm excited to see how these pearls help her gut issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: WRONG PRODUCT SENT
customer_reviews.text: I am hoping my son doesn't get sick while waiting for these to come. You guys sent me the adult version! I am not happy! My son has been taking this probiotic with the SmartyPants vitamins for 1.5 years. He is a type 1 diabetic with ADHD. Until he started taking these, he would have several illnesses with vomiting every winter/spring. In 1.5 years, he has thrown up maybe twice from illnesses, and was sick for only a couple days! Without these, he gets sick all the time. Vomiting is a diabetic parent's worst nightmare! We never go without these.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena W

customer_reviews.title: My kid doesn't get sick anymore!
customer_reviews.text: My preschooler has been taking the ENT version for almost two years now. He stopped getting the colds that run around his preschool shortly after starting the probiotic. He no longer gets the constant runny nose, either. This does coincide with removal of his tonsils, so some of this is related to that. However, two bugs have run through his classroom this winter and he hasn't even had a sniffle.
customer_reviews.author: DY

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Effective!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a probiotic for my son for several reasons, probiotics have so many benefits, but basically to help keep his gut healthy. I recently tried for myself Hyperbiotics Pro-15 probiotic tablet and saw that they had a children's version, so I tried it. So far so good! My son is 5 at first he was just chewing them, and didn't mind the flavor much, but because they are so teeny tiny he is able to just swallow them now! We are happy with them! They are effective and so easy to take you will not be disappointed!

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t a winner for us
customer_reviews.text: We really wanted to like this item and trusted that it tasted good based on reviews. My 4 year old spit it out, and my husband who takes all kinds of vitamins with no problem also couldn’t stomach it. So disappointed! Waste of money for us, hopefully can be returned.
customer_reviews.author: txsunshine

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: We love these! My poor 4 year old was sick every few weeks for quite a while, and his doctor said if he got strep one more time he'd need surgery to remove his tonsils and adenoids. I wanted to try everything I could before he needed surgery, so I bought these. There has been such a huge improvement in my son's health! He gets sick far less than he used to, it's not as severe when he does, and he's not had strep since. We're on our second bottle, and I will continue to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Suutopia

customer_reviews.title: We take at night with algae DHA
customer_reviews.text: We take this at night about an hour and half after dinner. Because it is one of the only timed release probiotics for children on the market we encourage our son to swallow whole with water. He takes this along side spoonful naturals algae oil DHA for children because probiotics are absorbed better with fat. Before bed allows the probiotics to survive better than if taken in the day because there is less sugar to kill off the probiotics.we have seen great improvement in our PDD son.
customer_reviews.author: Corrin Corbiere

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these during cold and flu season to boost ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these during cold and flu season to boost my kids immune system and focus on gut health. They were sick SO much last season and this year while using this product we had no sickness....not even a cold. At one time, half the kids were out sick in my daughter's class and she never got it. I'm ordering again because I truly believe in this product. This was the first time they have had to swallow a pill and they are so tiny that it didn't take them long to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Taylor

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY A probiotic my daughter can take. She's terrified of swallowing pills, since she choked on a small candy once. It was a crying fit and battle to get her to swallow a regular probiotic. So I told her I would try to find kid's probiotics that she didn't have to worry about. These are definitely it! She swallows them with ease, and on rough morning just chews them up.
customer_reviews.author: JD and Cali

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: My 10yr old took these a few times a week prior to this flu season. But when the flu outbreak hit this this winter I decided to give it to him every day!!!! He never got the flu!!!!! NO FLU AT OUR HOUSE!!!! He also thinks it helps his brain think clearer too. They are easy to swallow. We've taken other brands but this one seems to do best!!!!
customer_reviews.author: hwattie

customer_reviews.title: Helped fight C.Diff
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son developed C.Diff after taking antibiotics for an ear infection. We tried several different probiotics during his recovery & these were the most effective. The pills are small enough for little ones to swallow with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Kaden

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Very, very, very pleased! We have gone through 2 bottles so far and will definitely buy again. My daughter who just turned 4 can swallow them easily and loves them. They have a citric orange flavor and are pleasant to take. They also work good! The first week of the daughter taking them we saw improvement in her sleeping. She slept an average of an hour longer and quit getting up in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: I have submitted a new review after getting some wonderful personal help from a PRO-Kids representative
customer_reviews.text: I have submitted a new review after getting some wonderful personal help from a PRO-Kids representative. I was told this product can be cut into smaller pieces and hidden in foods like yogurt & other cold foods. The pearls are very small to start with (no sugar added-a good thing) but some kids (like mine) still won't take them with water. Also they are heat resistant for a while so there's no need to worry about mailing them during summer, which I was. I received 3 emails helping me keep my kids healthy....that's caring!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids will love them
customer_reviews.text: my 2 year old LOVES them. Her doctor gave them to her when she was 1 1/2 years old and she loved them then and now too. She calls them candy and gets very excited when I give her one. And if I forget to give them to her she reminds me she wants her "candy" its chewable so she bites it and eats it. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Avila

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old wigged out after thinking it was a chewable and said the flavor was the worst thing ever
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old takes this no problem. My 6 year old wigged out after thinking it was a chewable and said the flavor was the worst thing ever... but after learning how to just swallow it she does just fine. I do this proactively, as theres no health issues in my children im trying to remedy, so i cant speak to its effectiveness... but i occasionally take it and find it makes me more regular. So theres that.
customer_reviews.author: Jessa Exley

customer_reviews.title: Been buying for months, doubt it works
customer_reviews.text: I really doubt these probiotics do anything. I have been buying them for months and really don't know why I keep buying them. My 2-year-old has had countless Ear, Nose and Throat issues in the last 6 months. Croup, Adeno Virus, RSV, 6 ear infections just to name a few. He's literally had at least one ENT issue for the last 9 months. With gut probiotcs at least I can tell it helps with loose stool.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Solved Poop Training Issues!!
customer_reviews.text: My little guy had major problems holding his poop during potty training and this was the biggest game changer! Started using the prescribed amount for the intense support (3x per day) and within a week, my son finally became successful with pushing and it not being painful. From then on he has not had an accident and has been regular. Highly recommend this product, just wish it wasn't so expensive. We go through about a bottle a month!

customer_reviews.title: Not great taste
customer_reviews.text: Kids won’t eat these, hate the taste! They are so super easy to give though because of their small size I actually hid them inside their other gummies now.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Helps my little one!
customer_reviews.text: This probiotic works for my 6 year old. He suffered from food allergies and bad eczema. When taken daily, his skin is clear and looks normal and he can eat almost anything(except peanuts). I balance these with a good diet for him. If I let him deviate too far from good, real food his eczema will flare up again.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFanMom

customer_reviews.title: Not liked at first, but now they take them well
customer_reviews.text: Haven't noticed anything huge from this, and experience shows me that I usually don't until it isn't given for a period of time. I do believe that my DD is going more regular, which is a GREAT thing. I like how small they are. My DS (3) complained about the taste for a few days, my DD did at first too, but now about a week in, they take them mostly without complaint. I will probably purchase it one more time before deciding if I go back to our old one or this one is the new winner. I do wish that it had a higher number of probiotics in it.
customer_reviews.author: ktmb

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL STUFF!
customer_reviews.text: Made a huge difference in my grandchildren's bowel and overall health after antibiotic therapy. We have also used it crushed and added to the formula of an infant we know who was born c-section (no benefit of mom's vaginal flora to help populate it's gut) and who had multiple infections, even hospitalization with tons of heavy antibiotic therapy last winter. This company also provides excellent support and education. We are return, return, return customers, and have recommended this and other products of theirs to many family members and friends. Sent some to Africs for our newest grandbaby!
customer_reviews.author: C. Bassett

customer_reviews.title: I am so pleased with this product and i recommend it to any ...
customer_reviews.text: We initially bought this product after reading amazon reviews that claimed it cleared up eczema. Our four year old son's legs were unbelievably red and bumpy and nothing under the sun could improve it. We tried absolutely everything so we felt we had nothing to lose. Well not only has his skin remarkably improved after a month, but his appetite has increased and his bowel movements are more regular too! The pearls are super easy for him to swallow and can be chewed too. I am so pleased with this product and i recommend it to any parent struggling to find a remedy for their child's reoccurring eczema.
customer_reviews.author: CCEEDDD

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a GI doc, so I can't say ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a GI doc, so I can't say one way or another if they function at a basic level, I can only offer my view of how my 2 year old daughter views them. She was resistant at first, as she had been using a true chewable probiotic, but we couldn't find that one and I tried these. She has accepted that she has to finish this bottle but still insisted recently that we purchase the others next time. She is only just starting to form sentences, and that is one she has chosen to construct, so yeah, I don't think she is a huge fan.
customer_reviews.author: Just some guy

customer_reviews.title: it worrrrrkkkkssssss!!!
customer_reviews.text: our 6 year old had been complaining for a long time about her tummy hurting on and off. been to the doctor, every thing seems fine. finally found these and the reviews seemed really good. wanted to add mine to the pile... as soon as they were in her system good, we've not had a single belly ache! will continue to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: It REALLY WORKS.
customer_reviews.text: My toddler son had pooping in the pants problem, once we started giving this product, it stopped magically. Son does not like the taste of it, so we tried different brand. The result was awful, he started pooping in the pants again, so we return to this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Los Coyotes Pet Hospital

customer_reviews.title: the maker sent a nice email with lots of details about the product and ...
customer_reviews.text: My boys have been taking these for about 2 weeks now. I'm not sure that we've seen any benefits yet but I have no complaints about this product. The capsules are so tiny that my oldest has no problem swallowing it. My youngest has a strange phobia about swallowing, so he chews them. The bottle says that chewing is ok, but swallowing is the preferred method. After receiving the product, the maker sent a nice email with lots of details about the product and even information on prebiotic foods. I appreciate that they are working on educating consumers and thought it was a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: 2mamasboys

customer_reviews.title: 4-year-old says meh, mom says yes!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason this is getting 4 stars is that it is hard to get my 4-year-old to eat them. She wasn't a fan of the "tangy orange" flavor, but if I can mix it in some yogurt or a drink, I will. I did take one and didn't find the taste repulsive. Take the 4-year-olds comments with a grain of salt, as she pretty much only eats buttered noodles 24/7.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Taste is awful but as long as it works!
customer_reviews.text: Well, my daughter absolutely HATES the taste- but if they work as well as the women’s version, then she can deal with it lol. She hasn’t been taking them long but we are hoping this will welp with the UTI’s! Will have to update!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had to take 2 pills to get regular stools
customer_reviews.text: This isn't as effective as other probiotic I use for my 3yo. Tried saving money with this but it takes twice the dosage to help my daughter have bowel movements.
customer_reviews.author: Bronchosgirl

customer_reviews.title: I hope this will help
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a scientific explanation on how probiotics work, but I can confirm that my 11 years old son's allergy symptoms had improved. Last summer he took Zyrtec daily, this summer, after a course of probiotics of three month, he took Zyrtec 1-2 times per week.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for my daughter for a month and a half, and I am really happy with it. It helps keep her a bit more regular than she had been without taking this. The pill is very small and easy for her to chew. She is 3 years old. I would recommend this product to others looking for a safe probiotic for their children that's easily available.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: My 6yr was having acid reflux since she was 4yr ...
customer_reviews.text: My 6yr was having acid reflux since she was 4yr. Tried everything in the book, took many things out of her diet to no avail. Decided to give swallow pills a try as the gummies didn't seem to work what so ever and I was told probiotics help with the acid reflux issues. After 2 weeks she stopped complaining at every meal and had no reflux issues since!
customer_reviews.author: amiskell

customer_reviews.title: Helped with reoccurring ear infections
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far. I feel confident that, in combination with other alternative treatments, it has helped prevent at least one ear infection. Although the price is a little steep, it’s less expensive that constant pediatrician appointments and ear tubes.
customer_reviews.author: NikiB.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Awful
customer_reviews.text: I love this company and use other products from them. These unfortunately are a dud. I’m sure they are great for you but if you can’t get your child to take them then it’s kind of pointless. My daughter actually has a love for all medicines and happily has taken any I’ve given her till now. She spit it out and said it was disgusting. I had to try it myself. It’s pretty bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank You!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old went from being sick ALL THE TIME (literally went from chest cold to head cold to flu to respiratory infection to head cold, etc.) to having a very mild cold (not even quite sure it was a cold and not just allergies) once since he's been taking this at the beginning of December. His teacher noticed, family and friends noticed, and even other moms of kids in his class noticed. This has changed his life!
customer_reviews.author: Kris E.

customer_reviews.title: Easily manageable size and taste!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! The size is manageable even for smaller kids. Kids clearly like the taste when they don't fight taking them in the morning! The importance of probiotics is not lost on me especially with all of the tummy-troubles so many kids experience. Adding this into the kids' diets has been super helpful in keeping them healthy!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing dental product
customer_reviews.text: Great ENT and Dental product Good for everyone specially kids Good for gum care Good for cavity control Good for achieving a more basic mouth ph Good for bad breath Good for throat infections
customer_reviews.author: anais marcos

customer_reviews.title: Tiny pill
customer_reviews.text: My preschooler has regular tummy issues (constipation) and I’m not sure if this helps or not - although I like to think so. My child can’t or won’t swallow it, and instead chews, only to complain that it tastes bad. If your child will swallow, I’m sure it would be great.
customer_reviews.author: BeHappy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Started as a recommendation from 9 yo kuds doctor. I picked this one due to the good reviews. This has been helping him with constipation also. Only complaint is the flavor is bad as a chewable.
customer_reviews.author: Starla

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Healed the constipation my  toddler was experiencing
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Helped my poor contipated toddler whom, even tho she eats a very balanced diet, had problems with constipation. I would never give her that poisonous Miralax so I did some research and found these probiotics. Will be buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Time will tell, but the kids haven't had any noteworthy sicknesses since they started taking these ~8wks ago.--amidst what some pediatricians are saying is one of the worst winters in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Teutonic Speedracer

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Our toddler has had horrible diarrhea for the past year. Every diaper resulted in a bath and stripping the entire crib to be washed and remade. Many outfits were ruined. We have tried powdered, liquid, and chewable probiotics to no avail. We bought these because they were much cheaper than others we had found. At 20 months old, our toddler can swallow it whole on command! We have been doing 3 a day and the diarrhea is now a thing of the past!!! The time release capsule and tiny size are absolutely perfect for our situation. I very, very highly recommend these!!!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Son finally able to "go"!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product! I have been looking for years for a natural way to help my son with his bowel movements, and this works! He is now able to go every day without having to ask him to. Hopefully Mira lax is a thing of the past now with is product! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Spring

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: A doctor recommended this product to us as my daughter has swam year round since 6 months old. She had several ear infections from infant to 4yo. Started these three years ago and no infections since!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne S. Reese

customer_reviews.title: My son was having ongoing Strep infections and since taking ...
customer_reviews.text: My son was having ongoing Strep infections and since taking this probiotic, we have had no infections...going on 8 months!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Beardmore

customer_reviews.title: As described.
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described. Our 4 year old is able to swallow without chewing though our 2 year old always chews it. At 2 (one per kid) we go through the bottle quickly. We started using it when the boys were down with a bad respiratory infection with the thoughts that we may need to put them on antibiotics - - we were able to avoid that though regardless I'm happy to help their gut with this.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not for picky eaters...
customer_reviews.text: If your kid is picky or they have trouble with food consistency, they will not like these. They’re too powdery and the taste isn’t enough to override the feel. Now, if your child is old enough to swallow a pill, go for it. But I can’t speak to the efficiency of the product, because neither of my kids liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Working very well for my son... He had severe constipation and bloating stomach before, then after i started this probiotics his constipation gone and stomach also fully reduced... Note: initially started with 1 tablet daily but it doesn't work for him... Then i started giving him 2 tablets daily... It started working... I think his body needs 6 million probiotic to work... Happy mom now.
customer_reviews.author: Sugu

customer_reviews.title: Bad Taste
customer_reviews.text: Taste is so bad, my daughter refuses to take it. I can handle most everything, but after trying one - I agree with her! No orange taste at all. Very sticky texture that almost coats your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: A. Chakos

customer_reviews.title: These are absolutely wonderful! I have allergy kids and it is very ...
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely wonderful! I have allergy kids and it is very difficult to find probiotics and vitamins for them, let alone ones that taste good! My 2 and 6 year old LOVE these! Noticeable improvement in health too, for both of them and would place them on Subscribe and Save if I could, because I would not want to run out.
customer_reviews.author: Kacue

customer_reviews.title: Great, small pill
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old twins take these everyday. I haven't noticed anything to make me think they are not working as intended. They can be swallowed or chewed. I was hoping this would be a starter pill that my kids would swallow since it is tiny, but they both prefer to chew it up even though they don't love the taste. Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SED

customer_reviews.title: ... a probiotic for my kids and this one is great.. my kids dont complain about taking it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a probiotic for my kids and this one is great.. my kids dont complain about taking it and they even ask to take it.. It works well to get their gut moving and they use the potty more regularly. I would def reccomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney M Prudhomme

customer_reviews.title: Expired!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product at December 4th and I got it expired (10/2017). Joke??!!
customer_reviews.author: Katarzyna

customer_reviews.title: He loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My 5-year-old loves the taste. I bought them to hopefully help stave off the repeated bouts of strep and sinus infections he was getting. This is our first bottle. Time will tell if they do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: beckyb

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking the Hyperbiotics Pro-15 probiotics for several months now and I feel good about them. After my daughter ended up in the hospital with a course of antibiotics given I was pleased to find this kids version! At first she was scared to take the pill (she's 5) but after the first couple times it was easy and she now reminds me that she needs to take them : D I chose Hyperbiotics because their product seems to offer the best chance of living probiotics and this product appears to be that except in a much smaller form so it's easer for kids to swallow. Great idea!
customer_reviews.author: Bill C.

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, the kids love them
customer_reviews.text: My kids love taking these! They would have a ton of them if they could 😉 Since my daughter started school, both kids have been getting sick and so I wanted to start them on a probiotic. This has helped immensely. I will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Sandee E.

customer_reviews.title: 'Chalk' One Up for the 'Bad Taste' List
customer_reviews.text: They are good, and good for you. But the kids won't hardly eat them. I thought, "Maybe they're just being stubborn." So I tried one. Worse than those chalky pastel-like candies. If your kids do well with vitamins and medicines, they'll be fine. But if they're picky about taste like mine (and myself), or if they don't like chalky textures, I would avoid this one. I was limited in my options due to needing something without porcine gelatin.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: even better than the Rainbow Light brand that we love
customer_reviews.text: I've tried most top children's probiotics on the market and these stand at the top, even better than the Rainbow Light brand that we love. My 9 year old has many food sensitivities and mood swings due to imbalance in gut flora, but since having a daily Pro-Kids, she hardly ever has a bad food reaction and her digestion is regular and mood happy! And it's easy to little ones to swallow and/or chew - and only one tiny pill. I will keep buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son used to have horrible ear infections all the time that would take a ...
customer_reviews.text: My son used to have horrible ear infections all the time that would take a month to clear up with really strong antibiotics (he's allergic to all penicillins). He hasn't had any ear infections since starting this 6 months ago despite having a couple colds.
customer_reviews.author: R. J. Ribbing

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These have worked better than any gummy probiotics for the kiddos, and solved some gut issues one has struggled with for a long time. They love taking them, and I appreciate how compact they are in the pill boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Carleton

product_meta.title: Hyperbiotics PRO-Kids - 60 Tiny Sugar Free Once Daily Time-Release Pearls for Kids Ages 3 and Up - Easy to Swallow and 15x More Survivability than Capsules - Recommended with Vitamins
feature_bullets: GET 15 TIMES MORE SURVIVABILITY THAN WITH OTHERS. With a patented delivery method, the probiotic organisms in this formula are released over an 8-10 hour period so they bypass stomach acids and reach deep into the intestinal tract alive (where they are needed most) so your child can experience the benefits that probiotics have to offer.

GIVE YOUR CHILD THE FOUNDATION OF A STRONG IMMUNE SYSTEM. From our modern dietary choices to our daily hygiene regimens, there are many things that can affect the balance of bacteria critical for healthy digestion and immune function. Proper probiotic supplementation can help repopulate your child's gut, help with nutrient absorption, and support their natural defenses, giving your child a solid foundation for a lifetime of health.
KEEP YOUR CHILD HEALTHY. 80% of your immune system is in your gut. PRO-Kids probiotics help restore your child's beneficial bacteria for digestive and immune health.

DRAMA FREE AND EASY TO SWALLOW. This very tiny pearl is the smallest on the market and is easy to swallow for most children of chewing age and up. PRO-Kids pearls are most effective when swallowed rather than chewed (though they still taste great if chewed!).

PREMIUM PROBIOTIC SUPPLEMENT. Avoiding the synthetic and sugar-loaded ingredients you know are not beneficial for your child can be quite a challenge! You can rest assured because PRO-Kids is sugar free (sweetened with stevia) and has ZERO artificial colors, flavors, or sweeteners.
